labels.value: The system is currently undergoing maintenance and quotes are not able to be approved or rejected at this time. Please try again later.
The Quote or Opportunity Owner's management hierarchy is incomplete, preventing this quote from routing appropriately. Please log an OrgSF Access Request in BaseCamp.
This account is not eligible for quoting in OrgSF yet, or you have products unable to sold in OrgSF on the Opportunity. You can complete this in Org62
To Approve or Reject this quote please reply with text “Approve” or “Reject” to this email. To Add Comments or Reassign this quote approval, please access the approval in
To Approve or Reject this quote please reply with text “Approve” or “Reject” to this email. To Add Comments or Reassign this quote approval, please access the approval in

labels.shortDescription: Email content for notification when each Approval got approved.
labels.value:
Dear {0},
This is to notify you that {1} in submitted quote {2} has been Approved.
Please make necessary updates to quote and resubmit after the issue is resolved.

You have been added as a Backup Approver in a Public Group by {0} ({1}). You are now part of the public group: {2}, {3}.

To access the public group approver record, please click on the following link:
You have been added as a Backup Approver in Public Group
You have been removed as a Backup Approver in a Public Group by {0} ({1}). You are now removed from the public group: {2}, {3}.
You have been removed as a Backup Approver in Public Group
You have been added as a Delegate Approver for {0}. Delegation is active between {1, date,yyyy/MM/dd} and {2, date,yyyy/MM/dd}. To access the approver record, please click on the following link:
You have been assigned as a Delegate Approver of
Steps to be taken to resolve:

labels.shortDescription: Scoped notification message shown Quote is Archived
labels.value: This Quote was archived when another Quote on the same Opportunity was booked.

labels.shortDescription: Scoped notification message shown Quote is Accepted
labels.value: The Customer accepted the offer. No seller action is needed. Operations will book the Quote and create an Order.

labels.shortDescription: Scoped notification message shown Quote is Rejected from Bookings
labels.value: This Quote was rejected from Bookings.

labels.shortDescription: Scoped notification message shown Quote is Rejected from Approvals
labels.value: This Quote was rejected from Approvals. Return to Draft status to make changes.

labels.shortDescription: Placeholder for quick add product component

labels.value: Quote cannot be submitted for Approvals until Multiple Billing Frequencies are configured. Multiple Billing Frequencies are reset if the value of the Quote's "Term (months)" Header field is changed. Please (re)configure Multiple Billing Frequencies or update the Quote Billing Frequency to something other than Multiple.

labels.shortDescription: Error message when pattern mismatch in quick add product search
labels.value: For a valid product search, enter at least 3 letters
The Order Form for this Quote is being unpublished from eSign. This may take a moment.

labels.shortDescription: Scoped notification message shown Quote is Archived
labels.value: This Quote is Blocked and Archived Pursuant to the Account’s Legal Denied Party or other Legal/Compliance status and due to the Opportunity being Closed Lost. Please Contact #ldp-screening-help for questions.
Select a tenant before submitting for approval.

labels.shortDescription: Tenant Validation Message Before Publishing Quote
labels.value: One or more attributes within the Tenant record is missing. Please check the tenant record and add in all required attributes before continuing to Publish.
An error occurred while running product rules.

labels.shortDescription: Billing Address Country US Validation Message
labels.value: Please update the Billing Country to US
Enter a valid 5 or 9 digit US Postal Code in Billing Address. Hyphen is required for 9 digit Postal Codes

labels.shortDescription: Delivery Address Country US Validation Message
labels.value: Please update the Delivery Country to US
Enter a valid 5 or 9 digit US Postal Code in Delivery Address. Hyphen is required for 9 digit Postal Codes
If Auto Renew Preference is Yes, Renewal Term should be greater than zero. Also, Decimals and Negative values are not allowed
Please provide a valid Tax Registration ID.
Only letters and numbers are allowed in the Tax Exemption Id field
Please fill Purchase Order Amount without the Currency Sign
One or more of your terms is obsolete. To update, access the Term Manager from Draft.

We made a critical update to the term "{0}" which is applied to at least one Quote you submitted for Approval. Now the Applied Term is obsolete. You must return the Quote to Draft status and update it. Click to view the impacted Quote(s).
Please update the obsolete Applied Term "{0}" on your Quote(s)
Start and End Date cannot be before or after the Start and End Date of the Contributing Asset
Credit card information does not exist. Click "Capture Credit Card" to associate a credit card to this Quote
Direct Debit information does not exist. Click "Capture Direct Debit" to associate a debit account to this Quote
No issue with provided Credit Card info found.
No issue with provided Debit account found.
Salesforce accepts all major credit cards except for {issuer} and {issuer}. Credit card acceptance may be impacted depending on Billing Country.
Cardholder information should match exactly as printed on their credit card. If the customer has a middle initial on their credit card. please include the middle initial.
Account Owner information should match exactly as their Debit Account details. If the customer has a middle initial on their Debit details. please include the middle initial.
CVC/CVV is an anti-fraud measure represented by a three or four digit number, usually located on or near the signature panel for most credit cards.

We made critical updates to one or more Applied Terms on this Quote. Please Recall Approvals or set the Quote Status to Draft from the Header tab. Then update the obsolete Terms from the Term Manager.
We made critical/standard updates to one or more Applied Terms on this Quote. Please update the obsolete Terms.
The applied version of this Term is now obsolete. Please update it to the new version or delete it. We included the Previous Term Text on this page for reference.
Please update or remove the Applied Terms
One or more terms applied has missing tokens or other errors

Retrieving customer credit information for booking. This may take several minutes, please try refreshing the page. If this message persists longer than 5 minutes there may be a credit risk requiring approval by the Credit Department. If you have waited longer than 5 minutes after refreshing the page: Please log a Credit Case.
Something went wrong. Please contact your system administrator.
Issues that will prevent a Quote from being submitted for Approvals.
Issues that may not impact submitting for Approvals, but will impact Order Conversion.
Quote cannot be submitted for Approval until this error is resolved.
Quote can be submitted for Approvals, but will be blocked from Order Conversion until resolved.
An issue with this customer's credit score has been found. This quote cannot be booked until the credit risk has been assessed and approved by the Credit Department. Please log a Credit Case.
Credit Card or Direct Debit information is required before booking the quote. Please enter the required information.
Cannot move this quote to Accepted status as another quote on this Opportunity is already Accepted.

labels.shortDescription: Approval Request Notification Redlining Changes Original
labels.value: Change from original term text: deletion and insertion

labels.shortDescription: Approval Request Notification Redlining Changes Previous
labels.value: Change from previous term text: deletion and insertion
Please try to delegate the approver within the same business domain.
Quoting and Approvals are currently unavailable due to scheduled maintenance. Please check back later. View more details in Slack

Quoting and Approvals are currently unavailable due to scheduled maintenance. More information on the maintenance window can be found in the #broadcast-revenue-eops-comms channel in Slack. Please check back later.
Quote Line Items can not be deleted when the record is in Locked state.
Please navigate to Org62 to quote on this Opportunity. It is ineligible for quoting in OrgSF. OrgSF only supports Opportunity Types "New Business" and "Amend".
Please navigate to Org62 to quote on this Opportunity. You will not be able to publish this quote in OrgSF. There is already a Primary Quote on the Opportunity in Org62.
